Row.Text: We strive to do our duty, to serve our country faithfully at the expense of our blood and of our repose, to commit our whole being to it.
Friedrich II, pleased to meet you. I am an angel in the salon, but a demon on the battlefield.
Friedrich II, pleased to meet you. I am an angel in the salon, but a demon on the battlefield.
Friedrich II, pleased to meet you. I am an angel in the salon, but a demon on the battlefield.
I have been in the theater too long, and hunger for the sound of cannon.
To war, then! You rogues! Would you live forever?
And my critics said that my poetry would be my downfall!
"Bien sur," this is a rational offer!
A ridiculous offer. Send one better, or not at all!
